name: Cleenseau - Session 26
descTitle: Shadows, Forest Statues, and a Hell-Plane Swap
tagline: in which the party escorts a phylactery fragment and survives a planar exchange
shortSummary: In Cleenseau Wood and along the Aveil Ridge, the party carries a cursed phylactery fragment through haunted forest, fights shadow manifestations and demons during a hell-plane portal swap, and ends poised above Veltor for their next move.
longSummary: Tasked with delivering a cursed phylactery fragment to a higher-level adventuring party, Robin, Viepuck, Celyn, and Izgil choose the shortest route through the Greenwood the Great rather than approaching Veltor directly. They stash their horses at the ruined wizard academy and trek west through overgrown, ancient forest while the sphere’s psychic pressure gnaws at their nerves and dreams. In camp, Celyn's light spell reveals a pool of shadow around the box, triggering a brutal fight against a screaming shadow and its kin that lash at the party's courage and vitality, but are ultimately destroyed. Pressing on, they navigate orienteering challenges and encounter a lifelike petrified deer statue hinting at deeper dangers. Eventually, they rendezvous with their much higher-level allies to plan a transit to a hell-plane, building a pit-trap and layered spell zone to manage the expected 'equivalent exchange' as the other party departs. When the portal swap occurs, imps and barbed devils appear within the darkness; Viepuck's Hunger of Hadar, Izgil's area magic, and Robin and Celyn's melee prowess cut them down, with Celyn dramatically critting foes while invisible under Improved Invisibility. After healing and regrouping, they hike toward the cliff above Veltor, ready to leap down under feather fall as the next stage of their confrontation with the Baroness approaches.

npcs.name: Malach
npcs.notes: Lich whose phylactery fragment the party carries and whose influence manifests as shadows.

npcs.name: High-level adventuring party
npcs.notes: Thirteenth–fourteenth-level heroes working with Raoul who arrange the hell-plane transfer and ask the party to handle planar fallout.

npcs.name: Vahaiya
npcs.notes: Adventurer from the third-most-powerful party who watches over a portal on the party's behalf.

npcs.name: Es*tiaslos
npcs.notes: Scout and ally who assists with weirdberries and battlefield support during the demon fight.

npcs.name: Isabeau D'Aslain
npcs.notes: Baroness whose schemes in Aveil motivate the need to keep the phylactery fragment away from Veltor until the time is right.

npcs.name: Shadow manifestations
npcs.notes: Ghostly horrors that erupt from the cursed phylactery box and attack the party in camp.

npcs.name: Imps
npcs.notes: Lesser fiends that arrive when the hell-plane exchange occurs and are quickly dispatched.

npcs.name: Barbed devils
npcs.notes: Spike-covered demons that attempt to impale Viepuck and battle Robin and Celyn after the portal swap.

places.name: Cleenseau Wood
places.notes: Ancient forest where the party travels with the cursed phylactery sphere and fights shadow manifestations.

places.name: Aveil Ridge
places.notes: Ridge near Veltor where the portal-swap trap is prepared and demons appear.

places.name: Ruined wizard academy
places.notes: Relatively safe ruin where the party stashes their horses before entering the deep forest.

places.name: Greenwood the Great
places.notes: Old and tangled forest through which the party routes to hand off the cursed item.

places.name: Beldor
places.notes: Mining village used as a reference point for teleportation and planning.

places.name: Veltor
places.notes: Capital of Aveil, whose cliff edge the party approaches for a feather fall descent in the following session.
